how_it_staff_support.title: Why do you need maintenance?
how_it_staff_support.text_title: Our team assumes responsibility for all maintenance tasks, thereby saving you valuable time and effort that would otherwise be required for management of these tasks

descriptions.text: The creation of a website marks only the first stage in the process. The user experience (UX) will improve dramatically, in case the downtimes are minimized and the common bugs are fixed quickly
This is especially true when it comes to implementing new features or performing a complete website redesign. We will assume responsibility for the redesign, promotion and development of the project
Our team at Godev is always willing to be a reliable partner that helps you with website maintenance, feature integration, and any other post-launch tasks

Whether it is an ecommerce website or a personal blog, it is vital to keep it available at all times. This is particularly relevant for high-traffic projects that require seamless operation under load

how_it_staff_main.title: IT staff augmentation
how_it_staff_main.text_title: Godev offers outsourcing services: allow yourself more. Experienced programmers at affordable prices: Middle and Senior levels

descriptions.text: The first step in the staff augmentation process is assessing the specific needs of your project. This helps determine the programming skills and expertise required for successful project completion

Godev taps into its vast network of IT professionals to find candidates who precisely match your project’s requirements. These candidates are carefully vetted to ensure they possess the necessary skills and experience

Once the right candidates are chosen, they are seamlessly integrated into your existing team. They work alongside your in-house staff, following your company’s processes and using your preferred tools and technologies
Throughout the project, Godev provides continuous support to ensure the augmented staff meets your expectations. If needed, they are ready to provide additional resources or replace team members

how_it_staff_cms.title: Developing a website based on an existing CMS
how_it_staff_cms.text_title: We leverage popular CMS platforms to build websites that are both functional and easy to manage with minimal effort. Our professional developers can further customize a content management system to implement new features and ensure top-notch performance optimization to suit your business goals

descriptions.text: WordPress is a versatile CMS that powers millions of websites worldwide, known for its user-friendly interface and extensive plug-in ecosystem. At Godev, we create tailored WordPress solutions that enhance your site’s functionality and design

Magento is an e-commerce CMS solution that provides powerful tools for managing online stores, offering extensive customization and scalability. Our team develops Magento-based websites that optimize your online sales experience while ensuring seamless performance and great search engine optimization

Drupal is a robust CMS known for its flexibility and security, making it ideal for complex websites and applications. We utilize Drupal’s capabilities to create highly customizable and scalable solutions with custom features and addons tailored to your needs

Joomla offers a balance between user-friendly web designs and powerful features, making it suitable for a variety of websites. Our Joomla development services focus on creating dynamic and engaging sites that are easy to manage and update
Frameworks enable developers to build applications quickly and efficiently by providing ready-made components and structures
They enforce uniform coding standards, improving collaboration and simplifying code maintenance
Built-in features expand app capabilities, minimizing custom coding for tasks like database integration and session management
Many frameworks include security features that protect against common threats, ensuring data safety
Open-source frameworks benefit from active communities offering updates, plugins, and support, increasing reliability and innovation

Renowned for its flexibility and scalability, Magento is ideal for businesses seeking a customizable solution that can grow with their needs. Its extensive library of extensions and modules allows for tailored functionality, making it a preferred choice for large-scale enterprises

Known for its user-friendly interface and robust features, Shopify is a popular choice for businesses aiming for a quick and efficient online store setup. Its cloud-based architecture ensures reliable performance and scalability, while its vast app marketplace provides additional tools to optimize sales

As a WordPress plugin, WooCommerce offers seamless integration for businesses already utilizing WordPress, providing a cost-effective and customizable eCommerce solution. Its open-source nature allows for extensive customization, making it an excellent option for small to medium-sized enterprises seeking control over their online store

Beyond blogging, WordPress serves as a versatile platform for developing dynamic websites, including eCommerce functionalities through various plugins. Its global community of developers ensures consistent updates and a wide range of themes and plugins, enabling businesses to create engaging and functional websites with ease

Godev is responsible for designing any user interface. A team of professional designers with extensive experience developing mobile applications, websites, CMS, and software. We create user-friendly and beautiful digital products
From the construction of the logo to the creation of the corporate identity design. We will create a unique and vibrant image for your company
Our specialists build interface layouts that can be used on both personal computers and mobile devices, meticulously testing the software to ensure the platform is comfortable and optimized

Godev can optimize all aspects of an online platform, starting with its aesthetics and ending with SEO. As a result, the business gets a higher discoverability in search engines and shows better conversion metrics among new users
Our team is always on the lookout for innovations, and we carefully implement them to achieve a modern feeling and fresh aesthetics of any project

how_it_staff_landing.title: How a landing page helps your business
how_it_staff_landing.text_section: A strategically crafted landing page amplifies your marketing campaigns and aligns with your overall digital goals. Here’s how it benefits your business:

descriptions.text: With a tailored CTA and interactive features, landing pages capture leads effectively
By personalizing content and forms, businesses can gather high-quality leads tailored to specific campaign goals
Tools like calculators and forms help gather in-depth data on your audience, guiding future strategies
Pages designed with SEO in mind attract organic traffic and improve your online visibility
Optimized landing page design and development ensures a seamless user experience, boosting customer confidence and action rates

app_and_web_services_main.text_section: With a development team of 80 in-house specialists, we provide a variety of services related to online business practices, starting from web design and ending with creating brand-new downloadable apps

descriptions.text: We create a custom website tailored to your specific needs, whether it is an online store, an informational web portal, or just a landing page that serves as a virtual visiting card for your business
Our team can develop a web app that would fulfill all the needs of your enterprise. The software will be fully customizable, allowing you to bring your exact vision to life
Our development agency creates downloadable apps for mobile devices to make your business easier to access on the go. We work with Android, iOS, and other portable operating systems
We provide other web development services depending on your individual needs. We can redesign an app’s interface, optimize a new website, or help you configure the CMS
We will ensure the uninterrupted operation of your website or application. Quick execution of content tasks, antivirus protection, version backups, software updates, design and code revision
Our team provides other software development services depending on your needs, starting with creating web applications and ending with developing other interactive elements for your website

Godev builds websites seamlessly combining flawless visuals with powerful features, impressing the visitors with aesthetics. We also create individual web products of any kind to match the demands of your company

advantages_of_outsourcing_framework.title: Advantages of outsourcing for web development on frameworks
advantages_of_outsourcing_framework.text: Outsourcing web development to a specialized company like Godev presents several advantages:

descriptions.text: Reduces expenses associated with hiring, training, and maintaining an in-house development team, allowing businesses to allocate resources more effectively
Provides access to professional developers with extensive experience in various development frameworks, ensuring high-quality outcomes
Enables businesses to concentrate on their core competencies while the technical aspects of development are managed externally
Offers the ability to scale the development team up or down based on project requirements, providing flexibility to meet changing needs
Professional outsourcing firms implement rigorous testing and quality control measures, reducing the likelihood of bugs and enhancing reliability
